text: Allah woh hai jiss ney aasmanon aur zamin ko peda kiya hai aur aasmanon say barish barsa ker iss kay zariye say tumhari rozi kay liye phal nikaley hain aur kashtiyon ko tumharay bus mein ker diya hai kay daryaon mein uss kay hukum say chalen phiren. Ussi ney nadiyan aur nehren tumharay ikhtiyar mein ker di hain
